name: Pizza Time Arcade
description:
Behold! Through a societal need for nostalgia, the pizza-arcade industry is back! You just so happen to be the first fledgling entrepreneur in charge of replicating that 80's feel for the younger generation.

Micromanage your way through a series of threats posed by running such an operation:
  • Paying Employee Wages! (Oh My!)
  • Warding off criminal enterprises! (Oh No!)
  • Paying Taxes! (Legal Theft!)
  • The dreaded Karen! (I want to speak to your manager!)
